Auth.metaDescription: Login to your account or create a new one to start using Zoonk.
Auth.title: Sign in or create an account
Auth.subtitle: Continue with your email or a social account
Auth.terms: By clicking on Continue, you agree to our <terms>Terms of Service</terms> and <privacy>Privacy Policy</privacy>.
Auth.otpSubtitle: Enter the code we sent to {email}:
Auth.otpError: The code you entered is incorrect. Please try again or contact hello@zoonk.com
Auth.errorSigningIn: There was an error signing you in. Please try again or contact hello@zoonk.com

OTP.subject: Your Zoonk sign-in code
OTP.intro: This is your one-time passcode to sign in to Zoonk:
OTP.expiry: This code will expire in 5 minutes.
OTP.ignore: If you did not request this code, you can safely ignore this email.

Settings.metaDescription: Customize your Zoonk learning experience. Manage account settings, profile, and preferences to get the most out of our education platform.
Settings.title: Settings
Settings.subtitle: Manage your account settings, profile, and preferences.

Feedback.metaDescription: Share your thoughts and help improve Zoonk. Use the feedback page to contact us with suggestions, questions, or issues about our learning platform.
Feedback.title: Feedback
Feedback.subtitle: Send feedback, questions, or suggestions to us. Fill in the form below or email us directly at hello@zoonk.com.

Follow.metaDescription: Connect with Zoonk across social media. Follow us on X, LinkedIn, YouTube, and more to stay updated on new features, tips, and learning content.
Follow.title: Follow us
Follow.subtitle: Find all our social media links and keep in touch with us.

Help.metaDescription: Need help with Zoonk? Contact our support or browse the FAQ to quickly find answers to common questions.
Help.title: Help
Help.subtitle: Get support and answers. Fill in the form below or email us directly at hello@zoonk.com.

Language.metaDescription: Update your Zoonk app language to learn in English, Portuguese, Spanish, French, or other supported languages.
Language.title: Language
Language.subtitle: Choose the app language you prefer for this device.

Name.metaDescription: Set or update your Zoonk display name. This name may be visible to others and will be used when referring to you in lessons and exercises.
Name.title: Display name
Name.subtitle: This is the name others may see and the one we'll use to refer to you in exercises.
Name.name: Name
Name.success: Your name has been updated successfully!
Name.error: Failed to update your name. Please try again or contact hello@zoonk.com

Subscription.metaDescription: Manage your Zoonk subscription. View your current plan, upgrade or downgrade, and see available benefits.
Subscription.title: Subscription
Subscription.subtitle: Check your plan details and manage your subscription.

free.title: Upgrade to Plus
free.description: Remove ads, unlock unlimited exercises, and track your progress.

plus.title: Youâ€™re on Zoonk Plus
plus.description: No ads, unlimited exercises, and full progress tracking.

Subscription.error: Unable to change your subscription. Contact us at hello@zoonk.com

Home.metaDescription: Zoonk is an AI-powered learning platform where you can learn anything through interactive courses, lessons, and exercises.

Courses.metaDescription: Explore all Zoonk courses to learn anything using AI. Find interactive lessons, challenges, and exercises to learn subjects like science, math, technology, and more.

MyCourses.metaDescription: View all the courses you started on Zoonk. Continue where you left off and track your progress across interactive lessons and exercises.

Learn.metaDescription: Tell Zoonk what you want to learn and get a course generated by AI. Start learning any subject with interactive lessons and exercises.

Privacy.metaDescription: Read Zoonk's privacy policy to understand how we collect, use, and protect your personal information.

Terms.metaDescription: Read Zoonk's terms of use to understand the rules and conditions for using our platform and services.

Contact.success: Message sent successfully! We'll get back to you soon.
Contact.error: Failed to send message. Please try again or email us directly at hello@zoonk.com
